abstract: Kosovo Parliament votes, 82-5, to amend Constitution to allow for creation of war crimes court, which is expected to try ethnic Albanians; move is viewed by many world powers as vital prerequisite for regional reconciliation in aftermath of bloody Balkan wars of 1990s.
lead_paragraph: The formation of the court, which is expected to try ethnic Albanians, is viewed by many world powers as a prerequisite for regional reconciliation after the Balkan wars of the 1990s.

headline.main: Kosovo Parliament Votes to Allow War Crimes Court
headline.print_headline: Parliament of Kosovo Votes to Amend Constitution to Allow for War Crimes Court

snippet: The formation of the court, which is expected to try ethnic Albanians, is viewed by many world powers as a prerequisite for regional reconciliation after the Balkan wars of the 1990s.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
